titles.title: To prohibit the importation of certain rare earth magnets from covered nations, and for other purposes.
To prohibit the importation of certain rare earth magnets from covered nations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
